title: 2016-08-24 Loading / Patching issues
body:
**UPDATE @ 1800 AEST**
We've released a fix that should be applied when you start up League.  Let me know if anyone is still having issues!

**UPDATE @ 1400 AEST**
Fix incoming around 1600 AEST if all goes to plan.  [More info here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/xAWysx0u-2016-08-24-loading-patching-issues?comment=0005)



**Original Post**

Hi folks,

As of the 6.17 patch this morning, we're seeing a number of reports of issues loading the client and patching.  We're aware of an issue at the moment with our patching service, and we're working to fix it.  Stay tuned for updates in this thread.

Hopefully we'll get it fixed up nice and quickly so you can get back into game :)

Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body:
**UPDATE**
We've released a fix that should be applied when you start up League.  Let me know if anyone is still having issues!

Cheers
Mindstar
still not working for me :(

We've definitely resolved the original problem (from this morning), so it is possible you are experiencing a different issue.

Can you check out the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) support article and go through the suggestions there?  If it is still occurring after that I'd definitely suggest lodging a support ticket (on that site).

Cheers!
Mindstar
Why can't i log in, i want to eat my nan, kek, kekkerbear, #harambewasaninsidejob{{champion:62}}

Is there any patch notes about diamond 5+ being duoq only?
http://puu.sh/qMfx6/375297efca.jpg

**UPDATE**

TL;DR - Fix incoming around 4pm AEST if all goes to plan.

Long version - 
Overnight we encountered an issue with the system that we use to distribute our patches globally, and this caused patching to break for some players.  Whether or not you are affected depends entirely on OS version and windows updates that have been applied. We've put together a fix for the issue, and we're moving ahead to get the patch to all players ASAP.  This may take a couple of hours to get out the door as we need to do some final testing before we can release it.

The current ETA is that we should be putting the fix live at around 4pm AEST, at which time you'll hopefully be able to patch and log in.

Cheers
Mindstar
http://puu.sh/qMhcd/32edbb6861.jpg
Believe

I have always experienced issues logging in after patching. Loads EULA then disclaimer and then nothing. If I'm lucky I'll get the login page.

So unsure if this is my usual patching problems or related to this Login Issue. Either way, still not working for me. :(

Is this the unspecified error? Or am I getting something different to everyone else ._.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

That would be the one.  Well to be exact, you can get that for many reasons, but the issue we're fixing is causing people to see "Unspecified error" as well.

Cheers :)
Thanks Mindstar.
